snippet.title: New Super Mario Bros. 3 [Final Trailer of Version 2.0] by SKJmin
snippet.description:
Hello together!
I finally have finished my next revision of my game!

==========================

Note: Please watch this trailer in HD! 
(some screens got frameerrors... emu is pretty lame!^^)

Changes:
(I only count the MAJOR things) 


Game got a new laquering:
Almost every level sets were replaced by better and newer looking ones!
Took me ages to draw them and import them in the end! 


- Advanced/expanded levels:
The old game had exactly 298,823 blocks*!
The new one has "almost" the double of them! 512,124!
(PS: New Super Mario Bros. DS = ~220.000) 





- New backgrounds:
I've changed some of the backgrounds in the game!
I couldn't change some of them because of the mighty "Nintendo--bridge"-protection!
It would corrupt the most sounds in the game!
The airship levels are still IN the castle... sorry cannot be fixed now! 





- A huge load of new bonusrooms:
Yeah, I think it's the most exciting update! 





- 84 new bonusgrooms in total:
That means that almost every level got at least 1 more bonusroom!
And that means, that the star coins have to be searched more and more!
I've put a lot of new secrets and puzzles!
You won't be dissapointed! 





- More special guests:
Not much to say, our old retro videogame friends came to visit the Mushroom Land!
You can find exactly 30 cameos now! 





They're hidden pretty nice :)
Finding them will maybe cost your last nerves... 





- New FINAL CASTLE:
As you can see, I made a complete new FINAL CASTLE!
The old was almost unbeatable!

The new one has 2 routes now!
The main (normal) route and the sepcial (hard) route! 

To solve the hard one, you only need to beat the A-B-C levels (pretty hard imo^^)
When you can really finish the secret course, you will be awarded with.... (see next part)

Some feedback is wished!
Feel free to make advertisments to this great hack!
I will also work on 3.0 now!

Grertz and have fun!
SKJmin
